recoursemech: Dispute Resolution: Questions or complaints about Integra’s treatment of personal information will be handled in accordance with the Safe Harbor Principles.  If a matter is not resolved through internal Integra procedures, then the data subject will be directed to the relevant state or national EU data protection authority (DPA) or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) in the jurisdiction where the employee works or the customer, vendor or business partner is located.
